member.summary: The length of the atom content.

member.summary: Header level, that is, the number of hash marks found at the beginning of the text. Minimum value is 1.

member.summary: Markdown formatting type for this atom.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.Atoms.Atom.Quarks

member.name: T:DocumentAtom.Core.ChunkingSettings
member.summary: Chunking settings, that is, breaking atoms into quarks.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.ChunkingSettings.Enable
member.summary: Enable or disable chunking, that is, breaking atoms into quarks.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.ChunkingSettings.MaximumLength
member.summary: Maximum quark content length. Minimum is 256 and maximum is 16384. Default is 512.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.ChunkingSettings.ShiftSize
member.summary: Shift size, used to determine overlap amongst neighboring quarks. When set to the same value as the maximum quark content length, no overlap will exist amongst neighboring quarks. When set to a smaller amount than the maximum quark content length, overlap will exist amongst neighboring quarks. This value must be equal to or less than the maximum quark content length.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.ChunkingSettings.MaximumWords
member.summary: The maximum number of words to retrieve. Default value is 256.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.ChunkingSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Chunking settings, that is, breaking atoms into quarks.

member.summary: A separator line (contains hyphens and optional colons)

member.summary: Generate an MD5 hash of a DataTable. This method concatenates column names (separated by a null character) and all cell values (separated by a null character). Any null cells have their value replaced with the string NULL.

member.name: T:DocumentAtom.Core.TextTools.Lemmatizer
member.summary: Reduces words to their base or dictionary form by removing inflectional endings and returning the base or dictionary form of a word.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.TextTools.Lemmatizer.MorphologicalForms
member.summary: Dictionary for morphological transformations (comparative/superlative adjectives, adverbs).

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.TextTools.Lemmatizer.PreservedTerms
member.summary: Terms that should be preserved in their original form.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.TextTools.Lemmatizer.CommonPrefixes
member.summary: Common prefixes used in word formation.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.TextTools.Lemmatizer.CommonSuffixes
member.summary: Common suffixes used in word formation.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.TextTools.StringSequenceReplacer.Replacements
member.summary: Replacer sequences. Dictionary where the key is the match value, and the value is the value to use for in-place replacement. The default value for this dictionary includes whitespace, newline characters, braces, dashes, apostrophes and quotes, mathematical operators, and other common non-word-forming characters. Each key-value pair is evaluated any instances of the keys found in the supplied input will be replaced with the specified values. Replacements are evaluated in the order in which they are added to the dictionary.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.TextTools.StringSequenceReplacer.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: String sequence replacer. This class is used to replace specific substrings with replacement values, and is often useful for removing punctuation, reducing whitespace, and removal of special characters.
member.param: Replacer sequences. Dictionary where the key is the match value, and the value is the value to use for in-place replacement. The default value for this dictionary includes whitespace, newline characters, braces, dashes, apostrophes and quotes, mathematical operators, and other common non-word-forming characters. Each key-value pair is evaluated any instances of the keys found in the supplied input will be replaced with the specified values.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.TextTools.StringSequenceReplacer.Process(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.param: True to reduce whitespace in the returned string.
member.returns: Input string with replacements as specified in the replacements dictionary.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.TextTools.StringSequenceReplacer.Process(System.String[],System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Process an array of text strings.
member.param: True to remove empty entries after processing. If set to true, the dimensions of the returned array may be different than the input array.
True to reduce whitespace in the returned string.
member.returns: Input string with replacements as specified in the replacements dictionary.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.TextTools.StringSplitter.SplitCharacters
member.summary: Split characters. Input strings will be split using these characters.

member.summary: Extract tokens from an input string.

member.summary: Break an input string into chunks given the specified constraints.
member.param: Maximum number of tokens per chunk. Minimum is 1.
member.returns: Enumerable string, where each string contains one or more tokens.

member.name: T:DocumentAtom.Core.TextTools.WordRemover
member.summary: Removes stop words and other specified words from text while preserving word boundaries.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.TextTools.WordRemover.WordsToRemove
member.summary: Words to remove. When any of these words are encountered as complete words, they will be removed.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.Core.TextTools.WordRemover.WordSeparators
member.summary: Characters used to separate words during processing.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.TextTools.WordRemover.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the WordRemover class.

member.summary: Process an array of tokens, removing specified words.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.TextTools.WordRemover.Process(System.String)
member.summary: Process a single string, removing specified words.
member.returns: Input string with specified words removed.

member.summary: Method to invoke to emit log messages.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.Core.TypeDetection.TypeDetector.Process(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determine the type of a given file. CSV file types are inferred from the supplied content type header.
member.param: Content-type header value, if any. The content-type header is used to infer the content-type for certain difficult types, including CSV.

member.summary: Determine the type of supplied data. CSV file types are inferred from the supplied content type header.
member.param: Content-type header value, if any. The content-type header is used to infer the content-type for certain difficult types, including CSV.
